overview: Innermost is a visual / audio installation in collaboration with Natasha Barrett. This work's stereoscopic imagery and high-order ambisonic sound composition crafts new mechanisms of sound / image relationship out of dense and joyous field recordings of public gatherings in Oslo. This material, absent of protest, political rally or the threat of violence, yet amassing the free expression of individuals forms the basis of a magical synthesis of experience, paradoxically transporting the audience to the everyday.
title: Innermost
